Simple test
------------

Ensure your device works with this simple test.

.. literalinclude:: ../examples/serlcd_simpletest.py
    :caption: examples/serlcd_simpletest.py
    :linenos:

Examples
---------

1. Hello World - Write a 'Hello, World!' message on the display.

.. literalinclude:: ../examples/example1_hello_world.py
    :caption: examples/example1_hello_world.py
    :linenos:

2. Backlight - Change the backlight color on the display.

.. literalinclude:: ../examples/example2_backlight.py
    :caption: examples/example2_backlight.py
    :linenos:

3. Cursor Position - Randomly change the cursor position and print a character.

.. literalinclude:: ../examples/example3_cursor_position.py
    :caption: examples/example3_cursor_position.py
    :linenos:

4. Move Cursor - Move the cursor on the display.

.. literalinclude:: ../examples/example4_move_cursor.py
    :caption: examples/example4_move_cursor.py
    :linenos:

5. Enable Cursor - Enable and Disable the cursor on the display.

.. literalinclude:: ../examples/example5_enable_cursor.py
    :caption: examples/example5_enable_cursor.py
    :linenos:

6. Blink Cursor - Blink the cursor on the display.

.. literalinclude:: ../examples/example6_blink_cursor.py
    :caption: examples/example6_blink_cursor.py
    :linenos:

7. Scroll Display - Scroll the text on the display.

.. literalinclude:: ../examples/example7_scroll_display.py
    :caption: examples/example7_scroll_display.py
    :linenos:

8. Autoscroll - Autoscroll the text as new text is entered on the display.

.. literalinclude:: ../examples/example8_autoscroll_text.py
    :caption: examples/example8_autoscroll_text.py
    :linenos:

9. Custom Characters - Create and Write custom characters on the display.

.. literalinclude:: ../examples/example9_custom_characters.py
    :caption: examples/example9_custom_characters.py
    :linenos:

10. Turn Off Display - Turn the display off and on.

.. literalinclude:: ../examples/example10_turn_off_display.py
    :caption: examples/example10_turn_off_display.py
    :linenos:

11. Text Direction - Write text in left and right to the display..

.. literalinclude:: ../examples/example11_text_direction.py
    :caption: examples/example11_text_direction.py
    :linenos:

12. Display Input Text - Write input text from program onto the display.

.. literalinclude:: ../examples/example12_display_input_text.py
    :caption: examples/example12_display_input_text.py
    :linenos:

13. Fast Backlight - Change the backlight color on the display quickly.

.. literalinclude:: ../examples/example13_fast_backlight.py
    :caption: examples/example13_fast_backlight.py
    :linenos:

14. Show Firmware Version - Write firmware version on the display.

.. literalinclude:: ../examples/example14_show_firmware_version.py
    :caption: examples/example14_show_firmware_version.py
    :linenos:

15. System Messages - Show system messages on the display after commands.

.. literalinclude:: ../examples/example15_system_messages.py
    :caption: examples/example15_system_messages.py
    :linenos:

16. Splash Screen - Change the splash screen shown when the display is powered on.

.. literalinclude:: ../examples/example16_splash_screen.py
    :caption: examples/example16_splash_screen.py
    :linenos:
